{"data":[{"id":28,"title":"MariaDB SkySQL adds serverless analytics, cost management features","meta_k":"SQL mySQL","meta_d":"SQL mySQL","date":1689278400,"img":"shutterstock_359257322-100936181-large.webp","description":"The new release of the managed database as a service removes the need for extracting, transforming, and loading data by adding a \u2018serverless\u2019 layer powered by Apache Spark SQL","text":"<p style=\"margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 16px; margin-left: 0px; font-family: museo-sans, \" helvetica=\"\" neue\",=\"\" helvetica,=\"\" arial,=\"\" sans-serif,=\"\" sans-serif;=\"\" color:=\"\" rgb(78,=\"\" 66,=\"\" 66);=\"\" padding:=\"\" 0px;=\"\" font-size:=\"\" 1.125rem;=\"\" line-height:=\"\" 1.875rem;=\"\" max-width:=\"\" 620px;=\"\" background-color:=\"\" rgb(255,=\"\" 255,=\"\" 255);\"=\"\">MariaDB is adding features such as serverless analytics and cost management to the new release of its managed database-as-a-service (DBaaS) SkySQL, it said Thursday.<\/p><p style=\"margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 16px; margin-left: 0px; font-family: museo-sans, \" helvetica=\"\" neue\",=\"\" helvetica,=\"\" arial,=\"\" sans-serif,=\"\" sans-serif;=\"\" color:=\"\" rgb(78,=\"\" 66,=\"\" 66);=\"\" padding:=\"\" 0px;=\"\" font-size:=\"\" 1.125rem;=\"\" line-height:=\"\" 1.875rem;=\"\" max-width:=\"\" 620px;=\"\" background-color:=\"\" rgb(255,=\"\" 255,=\"\" 255);\"=\"\">SkySQL, which is a&nbsp;<a href=\"https:\/\/www.infoworld.com\/article\/3534698\/skysql-mariadb-as-a-service-launches-on-google-cloud.html\" style=\"color: rgb(239, 76, 35); text-decoration: none;\">managed instance of the MariaDB platform<\/a>, offers&nbsp;<a href=\"https:\/\/www.infoworld.com\/article\/3649211\/what-is-olap-analytical-databases.html\" style=\"color: rgb(239, 76, 35); text-decoration: none;\">OLAP<\/a>&nbsp;(online analytical processing) and&nbsp;<a href=\"https:\/\/www.infoworld.com\/article\/3650769\/what-is-oltp-the-backbone-of-ecommerce.html\" style=\"color: rgb(239, 76, 35); text-decoration: none;\">OLTP<\/a>&nbsp;(online transaction processing) along with enterprise features like sharding, load balancing, and auto-failover via a combination of&nbsp;<a href=\"https:\/\/www.infoworld.com\/article\/3574077\/how-mariadb-achieves-global-scale-with-xpand.html\" style=\"color: rgb(239, 76, 35); text-decoration: none;\">MariaDB Xpand<\/a>,&nbsp;<a href=\"https:\/\/mariadb.com\/docs\/server\/products\/mariadb-enterprise-server\/\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: rgb(239, 76, 35); text-decoration: none;\">MariaDB Enterprise Server<\/a>, and&nbsp;<a href=\"https:\/\/mariadb.com\/kb\/en\/mariadb-columnstore\/\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: rgb(239, 76, 35); text-decoration: none;\">MariaDB ColumnStore<\/a>.<\/p><p style=\"margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 16px; margin-left: 0px; font-family: museo-sans, \" helvetica=\"\" neue\",=\"\" helvetica,=\"\" arial,=\"\" sans-serif,=\"\" sans-serif;=\"\" color:=\"\" rgb(78,=\"\" 66,=\"\" 66);=\"\" padding:=\"\" 0px;=\"\" font-size:=\"\" 1.125rem;=\"\" line-height:=\"\" 1.875rem;=\"\" max-width:=\"\" 620px;=\"\" background-color:=\"\" rgb(255,=\"\" 255,=\"\" 255);\"=\"\">In order to help enterprises bring down the cost of databases and to manage expenditure better, MariaDB has introduced an autoscaling feature for both compute and storage.<\/p><div id=\"editorialfakesidebardiv\" class=\"fakesidebar fakesidebar-auto\" style=\"font-size: 1.0625rem; line-height: 1.625rem; margin: 0px 0px 1rem; overflow-x: auto; max-width: 620px; color: rgb(78, 66, 66); font-family: museo-sans, \" helvetica=\"\" neue\",=\"\" helvetica,=\"\" arial,=\"\" sans-serif,=\"\" sans-serif;=\"\" background-color:=\"\" rgb(255,=\"\" 255,=\"\" 255);\"=\"\"><aside id=\"fsb-4044\"><h4 style=\"color: rgb(34, 34, 34); margin: 1.625rem 0px 16px; max-width: 620px; padding: 0px; font-size: 1.225rem; line-height: 1.4375rem;\">[&nbsp;<u><a href=\"https:\/\/www.infoworld.com\/article\/3627792\/how-to-choose-a-cloud-database.html\" style=\"color: rgb(239, 76, 35); text-decoration: none;\">Also on InfoWorld: How to choose a cloud database<\/a><\/u>&nbsp;]<\/h4><\/aside><\/div><p style=\"margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 16px; margin-left: 0px; font-family: museo-sans, \" helvetica=\"\" neue\",=\"\" helvetica,=\"\" arial,=\"\" sans-serif,=\"\" sans-serif;=\"\" color:=\"\" rgb(78,=\"\" 66,=\"\" 66);=\"\" padding:=\"\" 0px;=\"\" font-size:=\"\" 1.125rem;=\"\" line-height:=\"\" 1.875rem;=\"\" max-width:=\"\" 620px;=\"\" background-color:=\"\" rgb(255,=\"\" 255,=\"\" 255);\"=\"\">\u201cRules specify when autoscaling is triggered, for example, when CPU utilization is above 75% over all replicas sustained for 30 minutes, then a new replica or node will be added to handle the increase,\u201d the company said in a statement.<\/p><div class=\"brVideoContainer\" style=\"bottom: 5px; right: 5px; width: 401px; height: 225px; position: fixed; border: none; overflow: hidden; z-index: 1400000; color: rgb(78, 66, 66); font-family: museo-sans, \" helvetica=\"\" neue\",=\"\" helvetica,=\"\" arial,=\"\" sans-serif,=\"\" sans-serif;=\"\" background-color:=\"\" rgb(255,=\"\" 255,=\"\" 255);\"=\"\"><div class=\"outer-wrapper\" style=\"margin: 0px auto; font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0); bottom: 66px; box-sizing: inherit; pointer-events: none; position: absolute; left: 0px; cursor: pointer; right: 0px; visibility: hidden; width: 401px;\"><div class=\"jw-nextup jw-background-color jw-reset\" style=\"text-align: left; direction: ltr; color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8); background: rgba(38, 38, 38, 0.8); padding: 0px; margin: 0px; float: none; font-size: 1em; line-height: 1em; list-style: none; vertical-align: baseline; border: 0px; font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0); border-radius: 0px; box-sizing: inherit; box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5) 0px 0px 10px; display: inline-block; max-width: 65px; overflow: hidden; opacity: 0; position: relative; width: 65px; pointer-events: all; transform: translate(0px, -5px); transition: opacity 150ms cubic-bezier(0, 0.25, 0.25, 1) 0s, transform 0s ease 0s;\"><div class=\"jw-nextup-tooltip jw-reset\" style=\"direction: ltr; color: inherit; background-color: transparent; padding: 0px; margin: 0px; float: none; font-size: 1em; line-height: 1em; list-style: none; vertical-align: baseline; border: 0px; font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0); box-sizing: inherit; display: flex; height: 30px;\"><div class=\"jw-nextup-body jw-reset\" style=\"direction: ltr; color: inherit; background-color: transparent; padding: 0.75em 0.3em; margin: 0px; float: none; font-size: 1em; line-height: 1em; list-style: none; vertical-align: baseline; border: 0px; font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0); box-sizing: inherit; flex: 1 1 auto; overflow: hidden; display: flex; flex-flow: column wrap; justify-content: center; align-items: center;\"><div class=\"jw-nextup-header jw-reset\" style=\"direction: ltr; color: inherit; background-color: transparent; padding: 0px; margin: 0px; float: none; font-size: 12px; line-height: 1.35; list-style: none; vertical-align: baseline; border: 0px; font-variant: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0); box-sizing: inherit; font-weight: 700;\"><\/div><\/div><\/div><\/div><\/div><\/div><\/div><div class=\"afs_ads ad-placement\" style=\"box-sizing: inherit; width: 1px; height: 1px; position: absolute; background: transparent;\">&nbsp;<\/div><\/div><\/div><\/div><p style=\"margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 16px; margin-left: 0px; font-family: museo-sans, \" helvetica=\"\" neue\",=\"\" helvetica,=\"\" arial,=\"\" sans-serif,=\"\" sans-serif;=\"\" color:=\"\" rgb(78,=\"\" 66,=\"\" 66);=\"\" padding:=\"\" 0px;=\"\" font-size:=\"\" 1.125rem;=\"\" line-height:=\"\" 1.875rem;=\"\" max-width:=\"\" 620px;=\"\" background-color:=\"\" rgb(255,=\"\" 255,=\"\" 255);\"=\"\">\u201cSimilarly, when CPU utilization is less than 50% over all replicas for an hour, nodes or a replica is removed. Users always specify the top and bottom threshold so there are never any cost surprises,\u201d it explained, adding that enterprises only pay for the resources used.<\/p><p style=\"margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 16px; margin-left: 0px; font-family: museo-sans, \" helvetica=\"\" neue\",=\"\" helvetica,=\"\" arial,=\"\" sans-serif,=\"\" sans-serif;=\"\" color:=\"\" rgb(78,=\"\" 66,=\"\" 66);=\"\" padding:=\"\" 0px;=\"\" font-size:=\"\" 1.125rem;=\"\" line-height:=\"\" 1.875rem;=\"\" max-width:=\"\" 620px;=\"\" background-color:=\"\" rgb(255,=\"\" 255,=\"\" 255);\"=\"\">In addition to autoscaling, the company has added serverless analytics capabilities eliminating the need for running&nbsp;<a href=\"https:\/\/www.infoworld.com\/article\/3231652\/etl-is-dead.html\" style=\"color: rgb(239, 76, 35); text-decoration: none;\">extract, transform, load (ETL)<\/a>&nbsp;tasks.<\/p><aside class=\"nativo-promo nativo-promo-1 smartphone\" id=\"\" style=\"overflow: hidden; margin: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 620px; color: rgb(78, 66, 66); font-family: museo-sans, \" helvetica=\"\" neue\",=\"\" helvetica,=\"\" arial,=\"\" sans-serif,=\"\" sans-serif;=\"\" background-color:=\"\" rgb(255,=\"\" 255,=\"\" 255);\"=\"\"><\/aside><p style=\"margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 16px; margin-left: 0px; font-family: museo-sans, \" helvetica=\"\" neue\",=\"\" helvetica,=\"\" arial,=\"\" sans-serif,=\"\" sans-serif;=\"\" color:=\"\" rgb(78,=\"\" 66,=\"\" 66);=\"\" padding:=\"\" 0px;=\"\" font-size:=\"\" 1.125rem;=\"\" line-height:=\"\" 1.875rem;=\"\" max-width:=\"\" 620px;=\"\" background-color:=\"\" rgb(255,=\"\" 255,=\"\" 255);\"=\"\">\u201cSkySQL enables operational analytics on active transactional data as well as external data sources using a serverless analytics layer powered by Apache Spark SQL,\u201d the company said, adding that this approach removes inconsistencies between an analytical view and a transactional view.<\/p><div id=\"sponsoredfakesidebardiv\" class=\"fakesidebar fakesidebar-auto fakesidebar-sponsored\" style=\"font-size: 1.0625rem; line-height: 1.625rem; margin: 0px 0px 1rem; overflow-x: auto; max-width: 620px; color: rgb(78, 66, 66); font-family: museo-sans, \" helvetica=\"\" neue\",=\"\" helvetica,=\"\" arial,=\"\" sans-serif,=\"\" sans-serif;=\"\" background-color:=\"\" rgb(255,=\"\" 255,=\"\" 255);\"=\"\"><aside id=\"fsb-4244\"><a href=\"https:\/\/survey.researchresults.com\/survey\/selfserve\/53b\/s00643290501?ctry=1&amp;ver=8\" style=\"color: rgb(239, 76, 35); text-decoration: none;\">Nominations are open for the 2024 Best Places to Work in IT<\/a><\/aside><\/div><p style=\"margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 16px; margin-left: 0px; font-family: museo-sans, \" helvetica=\"\" neue\",=\"\" helvetica,=\"\" arial,=\"\" sans-serif,=\"\" sans-serif;=\"\" color:=\"\" rgb(78,=\"\" 66,=\"\" 66);=\"\" padding:=\"\" 0px;=\"\" font-size:=\"\" 1.125rem;=\"\" line-height:=\"\" 1.875rem;=\"\" max-width:=\"\" 620px;=\"\" background-color:=\"\" rgb(255,=\"\" 255,=\"\" 255);\"=\"\">Further, it said that enterprises will pay for the compute used for analytics without the need to provision for processing power.<\/p><aside class=\"nativo-promo nativo-promo-1 tablet desktop\" id=\"\" style=\"overflow: hidden; margin: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 620px; color: rgb(78, 66, 66); font-family: museo-sans, \" helvetica=\"\" neue\",=\"\" helvetica,=\"\" arial,=\"\" sans-serif,=\"\" sans-serif;=\"\" background-color:=\"\" rgb(255,=\"\" 255,=\"\" 255);\"=\"\"><\/aside><p style=\"margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 16px; margin-left: 0px; font-family: museo-sans, \" helvetica=\"\" neue\",=\"\" helvetica,=\"\" arial,=\"\" sans-serif,=\"\" sans-serif;=\"\" color:=\"\" rgb(78,=\"\" 66,=\"\" 66);=\"\" padding:=\"\" 0px;=\"\" font-size:=\"\" 1.125rem;=\"\" line-height:=\"\" 1.875rem;=\"\" max-width:=\"\" 620px;=\"\" background-color:=\"\" rgb(255,=\"\" 255,=\"\" 255);\"=\"\">Additional features in the new release includes access for data scientists to a specific version of&nbsp;<a href=\"https:\/\/www.infoworld.com\/article\/3226734\/how-to-set-up-zeppelin-for-analytics-and-visualization.amp.html\" style=\"color: rgb(239, 76, 35); text-decoration: none;\">Apache Zeppelin notebooks<\/a>.<\/p><p style=\"margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 16px; margin-left: 0px; font-family: museo-sans, \" helvetica=\"\" neue\",=\"\" helvetica,=\"\" arial,=\"\" sans-serif,=\"\" sans-serif;=\"\" color:=\"\" rgb(78,=\"\" 66,=\"\" 66);=\"\" padding:=\"\" 0px;=\"\" font-size:=\"\" 1.125rem;=\"\" line-height:=\"\" 1.875rem;=\"\" max-width:=\"\" 620px;=\"\" background-color:=\"\" rgb(255,=\"\" 255,=\"\" 255);\"=\"\">\u201cThe notebook is pre-loaded with examples that demonstrate ways to run analytics on data stored in SkySQL. It can also be used to discover database schemas, running queries on data stored in Amazon S3 and federating queries to join data across SkySQL databases and S3 object storage,\u201d the company said.<\/p><p style=\"margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 16px; margin-left: 0px; font-family: museo-sans, \" helvetica=\"\" neue\",=\"\" helvetica,=\"\" arial,=\"\" sans-serif,=\"\" sans-serif;=\"\" color:=\"\" rgb(78,=\"\" 66,=\"\" 66);=\"\" padding:=\"\" 0px;=\"\" font-size:=\"\" 1.125rem;=\"\" line-height:=\"\" 1.875rem;=\"\" max-width:=\"\" 620px;=\"\" background-color:=\"\" rgb(255,=\"\" 255,=\"\" 255);\"=\"\">The new release of SkySQL has been made generally available on AWS and Google cloud. It includes updated MariaDB Xpand 6.1.1, Enterprise Server 10.6.12 and ColumnStore 6.3.1.<\/p><p style=\"margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 16px; margin-left: 0px; font-family: museo-sans, \" helvetica=\"\" neue\",=\"\" helvetica,=\"\" arial,=\"\" sans-serif,=\"\" sans-serif;=\"\" color:=\"\" rgb(78,=\"\" 66,=\"\" 66);=\"\" padding:=\"\" 0px;=\"\" font-size:=\"\" 1.125rem;=\"\" line-height:=\"\" 1.875rem;=\"\" max-width:=\"\" 620px;=\"\" background-color:=\"\" rgb(255,=\"\" 255,=\"\" 255);\"=\"\">New customers signing up for the DBaaS can claim $500 in credits, MariaDB said.<\/p>","author_id":10049,"category_id":4,"type":"post","publish_status":1,"comment_count":0,"view":17,"category_name":"mySQL","author_name":"Valentina","author_bio":"Hello, My name is Valentina.","author_posts_count":7,"user_img":"7.jpg","user_id":10049}],"end_time":1699638980}
